name: Monkey Oolong Harvest Bop
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52 (theme: Harvest)

  1. Your goal is to grab as many tea leaves as possible
  2. Launch yourself with [Space], then grab onto the tree with [Space]
  3. You can grab onto your monkey teammates to travel further than you could by yourself
  • [Space] Launch monkey
  • [Space] Grab onto monkey or tree
  • [Z] Change zoom

This game was made by the 5x Train team.

  • Discord
  • Twitter
